name: L.I.A.M
description:
WHAT IS L.I.A.M. ?

L.I.A.M. is a game where you personify a little character who has to clean all the areas from monsters. 

The game is made by TWO differents environments LAND and SEA. Both are teeming with monsters ! 

This game is still in development so there is not much levels to play with. It is currently under version 1.0.0

This game has been done during the : ANYTHING GOES JAM by 8bits to infinity For this jam we chose to have the "ONLY TWO COLORS MAXIMUM" restrictions.

HOW TO PLAY ? 
  • Beat all the monsters to complete the level
  • Don't be touch by monsters or you'll be damaged
CONTROLS : 
  • Use W A S D ; Arrows keys to move
  • Use H to hit
CREDITS :

All assets and code have been made during the week long game jam

This game is coded in pure Java, without using any engine or library.

  • art : Coximor
  • dev : StormCreeper
  • music : Willians Rodrigues

Under the direction of alt404 Game Studio .
